# Autumn Term

### GV481 Quantitative Analysis

**GV481 Quantitative Analysis for Political Science**

Lecturer: Dr. Aliz Toth

Assessment: Coursework (50%, AT), Exam (50%, Spring)

| Week | Lecture                                | Resources |
|------|----------------------------------------|-----------|
| 1    | Introduction to Quantitative Thinking  | Readings  |
| 2    | Correlation and OLS                    | Readings  |
| 3    | Uncertainty                            | Readings  |
| 4    | Causal Inference                       | Readings  |
| 5    | Randomised Experiments                 | Readings  |
| 6    | READING WEEK                           |           |
| 7    | Selection on Observables               | Readings  |
| 8    | Instrumental Variables                 | Readings  |
| 9    | Regression Discontinuity               | Readings  |
| 10   | Differences-in-Differences             | Readings  |
| 11   | Survey Experiments                     | Readings  |
